name: Little Pelican
description: Using Little Pelican while underwater will allow you to swim faster. Continuously consume endurance while moving, and stop moving to slowly recover endurance. Cooldown: **90** seconds. Up to **2** charges. Little Pelican will automically illuminate surroundings with its light.
advancements: Recover up to full endurance when using Little Pelican, does not take effect when exhausted.
Increase volt damage by **2%** even when not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
Cooldown reduced to **30** seconds, and a new skin **Flower Color** is unlocked.
